results.title: Leiningen
results.summary: Leiningen is the easiest way to use Clojure, focusing on project automation and declarative configuration to streamline the coding process.

results.title: Red Planet Labs
results.summary: Red Planet Labs offers the Rama developer platform, which unifies various backend components into a single, fault-tolerant programming model that scales efficiently. It simplifies backend development by reducing infrastructure complexity and allowing for flexible data models.

results.title: Introduction :: Red Planet Labs
results.summary: Rama is a new programming platform that enhances application development through a distributed-first paradigm, allowing developers to focus on logic rather than low-level hurdles. This documentation provides insights into mastering Rama application development and understanding its unique programming model.

results.title: Rama Demo Gallery
results.summary: An open-source repository showcasing short, self-contained examples of applying Rama to various use cases, including time-series analytics and REST API integration, all designed to be scalable and fault-tolerant.

results.title: Twitter-Scale Mastodon
results.summary: This project implements Mastodon's backend from scratch, designed to scale to Twitter's level while using significantly less code, demonstrating the efficiency of the Rama platform.

results.title: Reducing Costs of Building Twitter at Scale
results.summary: A detailed post exploring how the 'twitter-scale-mastodon' project achieves significant reductions in code and complexity compared to traditional implementations, showcasing the advantages of using Rama.

results.title: Rama Tutorial 1
results.summary: The first tutorial in the Rama documentation introduces core concepts and guides users in building real applications, laying the groundwork for understanding the platform's capabilities.

results.title: Rama Terminology
results.summary: A quick reference page listing the main terminology used throughout the Rama documentation, aiding users in understanding the platform's concepts and features.

results.title: Operating Rama Clusters
results.summary: This page provides essential information on setting up and managing Rama clusters, ensuring that applications can evolve with their performance needs over time.

results.title: Integrating with Other Tools
results.summary: Guidance on how to integrate Rama with various tools, including queues and databases, to enhance its functionality and interoperability with existing systems.
